question: Bihar launches scheme for checking crimes against women at public places, What is the name of the scheme?
explanation: Bihar State Government approved a "Safe City Surveillance" scheme for curbing eve-teasing, harassment and other crimes against women at public places. The scheme envisages installation of CCTV cameras at public places across the state. "Safe City Surveillance" scheme will be implemented in a phase-wise manner and Home Department of Bihar will be the nodal agency for implementing this scheme.
